trans-unit.resname: KHM·40 | Alrund, God of the Cosmos | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Alrund gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand and each foretold card you own in exile. At the beginning of your end step, choose a card type, then reveal the top two cards of your library. Put all cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target:
你每有一张手牌或放逐区中每有一张由你拥有且已预示的牌，艾朗德便得+1/+1。 在你的结束步骤开始时，选择一种牌张类别，然后展示你牌库顶的两张牌。将所有该类别的牌置于你手上，其余则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。
鸟 {1}{U}

trans-unit.source: "You cannot stand against us, but when you fall, you will stand with us!"

trans-unit.target: 在特格莉德年幼时，她的影子曾想置她于死地。唯靠手中提灯才令其无从近身。

当谎言神瓦尔基进战场时，每位对手各展示其手牌。为每位对手各进行以下流程～放逐一张其以此法展示的生物牌，直到瓦尔基离开战场为止。 {X}：选择一张以瓦尔基放逐且总法术力费用为X的生物牌。瓦尔基成为该牌的复制品。

于提勃进战场时，你获得具有「你可以使用以寰宇冒名客提勃放逐的牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放这类咒语的费用」的徽记。 +2：放逐每位牌手的牌库顶牌。 −3：放逐目标神器或生物。 −8：放逐所有坟墓场中的所有牌。加{R}{R}{R}。

trans-unit.source: "Orders? We don't wait for orders!"

trans-unit.resname: KHM·135 | Fearless Liberator | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "No one else had the spine for it, so I ran right between that giant's legs and hauled poor Valdir back to Axgard!"
trans-unit.target: 「眼看其他人都畏缩不前，于是我就看准巨人两腿之间的空档直冲过去，把可怜的瓦迪尔拖回了艾席嘉！」

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. Choose 1, 2, or 3 at random. Its controller mills that many cards, then exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card with a different name than that spell. They may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then they put the exiled cards on the bottom of their library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。随机选择1，2或3。其操控者磨等量的牌，然后从其牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张名称与该咒语不相同的非地牌为止。他可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。然后他将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于其牌库底。

trans-unit.target: 为能侍奉死亡之神，奈尔非甚至抛弃了生命的温暖。

trans-unit.resname: KHM·225 | Niko Aris | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 尼科阿理斯

trans-unit.resname: KHM·225 | Niko Aris | Card Text: Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: KHM·225 | Niko Aris | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: +1：至多一个目标由你操控的生物本回合不能被阻挡。本回合中，每当该生物造成伤害时，将它移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: KHM·225 | Niko Aris | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−1]: Niko Aris deals 2 damage to target tapped creature for each card you've drawn this turn.
trans-unit.target: −1：选择目标已横置的生物。你本回合中每抓过一张牌，尼科阿理斯便对它造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: KHM·225 | Niko Aris | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: [−1]: Create a Shard token.
trans-unit.target: −1：派出一个碎片衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: KHM·248 | Alpine Meadow | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Here perished Rognar the Reckless after his hundred-day battle with the Ironmaw Dragon. We raised these stones to mark his resting place."\n—Iskene, Kannah storyteller
trans-unit.target: 「勇莽洛格纳在与铁口巨龙大战百日之后咽气于此。我们在他安息之处周围设立石碑以资纪念。」 ～卡纳说书人伊斯琴

trans-unit.resname: KHM·249 | Arctic Treeline | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When the Light of Starnheim shines here, every frost-edged needle glitters with the reflected glory of the Cosmos."\n—Iskene, Kannah storyteller
trans-unit.target: 「一旦斯达海姆之光照耀此地，覆霜草叶尖端全都染上亮泽，共同闪烁寰宇荣辉。」 ～卡纳说书人伊斯琴

trans-unit.source: "Listen! The trees tell tales of their ancestors in the whisper-song of leaves."\n—Inga Rune-Eyes
trans-unit.target: 「仔细听！落叶扑簌成曲，树木正借此歌颂先祖传说。」 ～符眼茵嘉

trans-unit.target: 「相信径路，它便会将你带至安全之所。」 ～符眼茵嘉

trans-unit.source: "The waters smell oddly sweet, but do not be enticed. You don't want to meet what lurks below the surface."\n—Solrun, Beskir warrior
trans-unit.target: 「此处池水虽散发出奇异甜美气息，但切勿受其迷惑。你不会想遇上藏身水面下的东西。」 ～贝斯奇战士索兰

trans-unit.source: "Our brave Tuskeri brethren blaze new trails, and we follow, mapping the routes of those who survive."\n—Solrun, Beskir warrior
trans-unit.target: 「我们勇敢的塔科力兄弟开辟出新的路径，而我们跟随而上，沿着幸存者的脚步绘出行路地图。」 ～贝斯奇战士索兰

trans-unit.resname: KHM·254 | Darkbore Pathway | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hush, and stay still. No matter how dreary the darkness, a light in the Skelle Mire is never a good sign."\n—Haugar, Kannah wayfinder
trans-unit.target: 「嘘，站定别动。尽管置身死寂般黑暗并不好受，但在斯凯尔泥沼见到亮光绝不是什么好兆头。」 ～卡纳引路人豪格

trans-unit.resname: KHM·254 | Slitherbore Pathway | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Cosmos Serpent carved these tunnels, and his echo remains, a twisting aura of ferocity and boundless growth."\n—Haugar, Kannah wayfinder
trans-unit.target: 「这些隧道乃是由寰宇盘蛇辟就，因此带来的扭曲影响依旧回荡其间，引致万物迅猛成长永不停歇。」 ～卡纳引路人豪格

trans-unit.resname: KHM·255 | Faceless Haven | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It is everywhere and nowhere, a place unbound by logic, just beyond the real.
trans-unit.target: 这里既是所有地方，又不是任何地方；它不受逻辑束缚，乃是一处超越实界的存在。

trans-unit.source: "I cannot read these runes, yet somehow they seem like a warning. Have we passed unknowingly into a new realm?"\n—Ekken, Omenseeker navigator
trans-unit.target: 「我读不懂这些文字，但它们看起来像是某种警告。难道我们在不知不觉间来到了新的境域？」 ～预兆觅径人领航员埃肯

trans-unit.target: 「我从未见过如此不自然的浓雾～大海止于何方，天空又始于何处？」 ～预兆觅径人领航员埃肯

trans-unit.resname: KHM·261 | Highland Forest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Tread carefully! The last time I walked this path, half the snowdrifts were, in fact, sleeping trolls. I've never run so fast in my life!"\n—Iskene, Kannah storyteller
trans-unit.target: 「下脚的时候当心点！我上次走这条路时，这里至少有一半的雪堆是熟睡的巨魔。我这辈子从没跑得那么快！」 ～卡纳说书人伊斯琴

trans-unit.resname: KHM·262 | Ice Tunnel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The ice cracked underfoot; strange shapes swam beneath the surface. Who else has walked this blighted path?"\n—Iskene, Kannah storyteller
trans-unit.target: 「冰面在脚下裂开，奇异形体在水底游动。你们还有谁走过这条诅咒之路？」 ～卡纳说书人伊斯琴

trans-unit.source: "Young Vitima bellowed to the Cosmos, daring the gods to punish her hubris! Well, she got their attention, as you can see."\n—Iskene, Kannah storyteller
trans-unit.target: 「年轻的维提玛曾向寰宇狂啸，想看看自己的无礼行为会不会受到诸神惩罚。正如你们所见，诸神听到了她的要求。」 ～卡纳说书人伊斯琴

trans-unit.resname: KHM·376 | Cleaving Reaper | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: KHM·407 | Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If you would put one or more counters on a permanent or player, put twice that many of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将在某永久物或牌手上放置一个或数个指示物，则改为在该永久物或牌手上放置两倍数量的各种指示物。

trans-unit.resname: KHM·407 | Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: If an opponent would put one or more counters on a permanent or player, they put half that many of each of those kinds of counters on that permanent or player instead, rounded down.
trans-unit.target: 如果对手将在某永久物或牌手上放置一个或数个指示物，则改为他在该永久物或牌手上放置一半数量的各种指示物，小数点后舍去。
